mapper.insert: insert into cms_member_report (id, report_type, report_member_name, create_time, report_object, report_status, handle_status, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportMemberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handleStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, report_type, report_member_name, create_time, report_object, report_status, handle_status, note from cms_member_report
